BasicBlock (llvm.core)

A basicblock is a list of instructions. A wellformed basicblock should end with a terminator. Function.verify() will verify that. A terminator is either a branch instruction or return instruction. It is not possible to have instructions after a branch or return instruction.

llvm.core.BasicBlock

Base Class

  • llvm.core.Value

Methods

delete(self)

Delete this basicblock from the function (self.function).

insert_before(self, name)

Proporties

function

The parent function of this basicblock.

A list of instructions in this basicblock.
